channel.title: RsuneLive - Everything you've always wanted! -Now Hiring-
channel.description:
[QUOTE][CENTER][IMG]http://img413.imageshack.us/img413/5711/runelive.png[/img]
[B] Runelive/Euroscape is back, and better then ever! This server has been around a long time, peaking 500 players very often. We are here to bring you an experience of a life time. We feel that your experience shouldn't be a cake walk, but it definitely should be far from boring.
[B][CENTER]Features: ~Pvp Armors (All effects and specials) ~Chaotic weapons(Works just like RS) ~A slayer based economy! This makes slayer one of the most useful aspects of the game, most items will be obtained from slayer. ~Tormented Demons- Correct Emotes/GFX works just like rs, Custom spot for them. ~Corperal Beast- Correct Emotes/GFX drops spirit shields/ sigils just like rs! ~Staff of Light- Has the 50% damage deduction special! ~Clipped Following. ~Combat following (Melee/Range/Mage) ~Awesome custom RFD quest, fight your way to the amazing barrow gloves! ~604 Gameplay in a 317! ~Curse Prayers work exactly in RS, EVERY SINGLE ONE OF THEM! ~Current RS Firecape emote. ~Skillcape Emotes. ~ 1 Wave Firecape. ~Amazing Staff ~PERFECTED Pking. ~100% Bridding/ Item Switching. ~Barrows and effects. ~Pk points, EP (Earning Potential) that gives you a chance to get pvp items on drops! ~Perfect Xp rates, doesn't take very long for a 99 combat skill. ~100% Dragon claws with perfected emote. ~100% all godsword specials- Zgs freezes, Sgs regains pray/hp, Bgs lowers defence, Ags- Amazing hits. ~Absolutely and positively NO DUPES. It is absolutely impossible to dupe on our server. ~Friendly Gameplay. ~THERE IS NO "DONATOR ONLY" ITEMS! Anyone can use anything if they have the proper requirements! ~Shops are located in varrock, where they would actually be! Gives you a more "real" gaming experience. ~All spirit shields and their effects! Divine- Deducts 30% damage. Elysian- 70% chance to deduct 30% damage. Arcane- +20 Magic Attack Bonus. Spectral- +30 magic defense bonus! ~Amazing custom spot for tormented demon ladder. You must make your way through the wilderness to get to 13 wild, and avoid pkers! ~A perfect economy. ~Slayer helmet gives 50% extra exp when doing slayer! ~Lock exp..for all those pures who want to use whips :) ~Every single skill works![/CENTER][/B] [COLOR="Red"][CENTER] [B]Curses & Specials[/B][/CENTER][/COLOR]
[CENTER][IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/1014121/runelive.gif[/img]
[COLOR="Red"][B]Oh? See this, this my friend is what we call; a perfect Staff of Light![/B][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2dv6fia.png[/img][/CENTER] [COLOR="Red"][B][CENTER]
Idk about you, But i'm getting tired of the whole "Mage book tele" crisis. I'd much rather[/CENTER][/B] [/COLOR]
[CENTER][IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/14sk6cz.png[/img][/CENTER]
[CENTER][COLOR="Red"][B]Styke worms[/B][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2mcgksi.png[/img][/CENTER][/QUOTE]
Download Client -[url=http://www.2shared.com/file/yUvFLz6y/RuneLive_Client.html] http://www.2shared.com/file/yUvFLz6y/RuneLive_Client.html[/url] Download Cache: [url=http://uppit.com/epggbiwj27z0/RuneLive_Cache.rar]UppIT - Free File Sharing - RuneLive_Cache.rar[/url] - place the cache in ur c:/ drive.
we maxed 552 players, and over 2.6k of donations a month
P.S I also will report flame, I know it#s bad but atlest it got players unlike some other server's that are done much better then this,I also do not expect many people to download it, but have fun guys, Cache is coming maybe in an hour after my dinner. LEAVE A COMMENT OR I REMOVE
some extra info for people who don't read :L
Ok for windows 7 / 64 bit: [CODE]@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server EXIT[/CODE]
change the exit to pause it should now look like [CODE]@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/CODE]
windows vista/xp/32 bit: [CODE]@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files (X86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server EXIT[/CODE]
change the exit to pause it should now look like [CODE]@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/CODE]
now to fix client go to the client.java
search for [CODE][runelivepk656.no-ip.org[/CODE]
change to:
[CODE]127.0.0.1[/CODE]
now search for: [CODE] socketStream = new RSSocket(this, openSocket(5555));[/CODE]
change to:
[CODE] socketStream = new RSSocket(this, openSocket(43594));[/CODE]
save, compile, to use the auto restart
use the sar.bat, if you windows 7 user / 64 bit no need to change
if your a windows xp/vista use: [CODE]@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server EXIT[/CODE]
[CODE] ::Copyright Â© MMVIII all rights reserved 2008 @echo off title Server Automated Restarter :start set time=[COLOR="#ff0000"]18000[/COLOR] this is seconds so this is 3 hours, each hour is 6,000 seconds. start run.bat :loop cls IF %time% GTR 0 ( set /a time=%time% - 1 set /a min=%time%/60 echo Next Restart In %time% Seconds. echo %time% Seconds is %min% Minutes. ping 127.0.0.1 -n 2 > NUL goto loop ) taskkill /f /im java.exe cls goto start ::Made By RSC/Logical[/CODE]
how to compile in client (windows 7/ 64bit) in 2. compile 21 change: [CODE] @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/CODE]
to
[CODE]@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_[COLOR="#ff0000"]YOUR JDK VERSION HERE[/COLOR]\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/CODE]
for windows vista/xp/32bit: in 2. compile 21 change: [CODE] @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/CODE]
[CODE] @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_[COLOR="#ff0000"]YOUR JDK VERSION[/COLOR]\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause[/CODE]
how to compile server sided:
windows 7/ 64bit: change: [CODE]@echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause EXIT[/CODE]
to: [CODE]@echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_[COLOR="#ff0000"]YOUR JDK VERSION[/COLOR]\bin\javac" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause [/CODE]
Windows vista/XP/32 bit change: [QUOTE]@echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause EXIT[/QUOTE]
to [QUOTE]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_[COLOR="#ff0000"]YOUR JDK VERSION[/COLOR]\bin\javac" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause [/QUOTE][/CENTER] [/quote]

item.title: RsuneLive - Everything you've always wanted! -Now Hiring-
item.dc:creator: @Zygoz Zygoz
item.description:
@Zygoz wrote:

[QUOTE][CENTER]

[B]
Runelive/Euroscape is back, and better then ever!
This server has been around a long time, peaking 500 players very often.
We are here to bring you an experience of a life time.
We feel that your experience shouldnât be a cake walk, but it definitely should be far from boring.

[CENTER]Features:
~Pvp Armors (All effects and specials)
~Chaotic weapons(Works just like RS)
~A slayer based economy! This makes slayer one of the most useful aspects of the game, most items will be obtained from slayer.
~Tormented Demons- Correct Emotes/GFX works just like rs, Custom spot for them.
~Corperal Beast- Correct Emotes/GFX drops spirit shields/ sigils just like rs!
~Staff of Light- Has the 50% damage deduction special!
~Clipped Following.
~Combat following (Melee/Range/Mage)
~Awesome custom RFD quest, fight your way to the amazing barrow gloves!
~604 Gameplay in a 317!
~Curse Prayers work exactly in RS, EVERY SINGLE ONE OF THEM!
~Current RS Firecape emote.
~Skillcape Emotes.
~ 1 Wave Firecape.
~Amazing Staff
~PERFECTED Pking.
~100% Bridding/ Item Switching.
~Barrows and effects.
~Pk points, EP (Earning Potential) that gives you a chance to get pvp items on drops!
~Perfect Xp rates, doesnât take very long for a 99 combat skill.
~100% Dragon claws with perfected emote.
~100% all godsword specials- Zgs freezes, Sgs regains pray/hp, Bgs lowers defence, Ags- Amazing hits.
~Absolutely and positively NO DUPES. It is absolutely impossible to dupe on our server.
~Friendly Gameplay.
~THERE IS NO âDONATOR ONLYâ ITEMS! Anyone can use anything if they have the proper requirements!
~Shops are located in varrock, where they would actually be! Gives you a more ârealâ gaming experience.
~All spirit shields and their effects!
Divine- Deducts 30% damage.
Elysian- 70% chance to deduct 30% damage.
Arcane- +20 Magic Attack Bonus.
Spectral- +30 magic defense bonus!
~Amazing custom spot for tormented demon ladder. You must make your way through the wilderness to get to 13 wild, and avoid pkers!
~A perfect economy.
~Slayer helmet gives 50% extra exp when doing slayer!
~Lock expâ¦for all those pures who want to use whips
~Every single skill works![/CENTER]
[COLOR=âRedâ][CENTER]
Curses & Specials[/CENTER][/COLOR]

[CENTER]

[COLOR=âRedâ]Oh? See this, this my friend is what we call; a perfect Staff of Light![/COLOR]

2dv6fia.png760Ã545
[/CENTER]
[COLOR=âRedâ][B][CENTER]

Idk about you, But iâm getting tired of the whole âMage book teleâ crisis.
Iâd much rather[/CENTER][/B]
[/COLOR]

[CENTER]

14sk6cz.png768Ã548
[/CENTER]

[CENTER][COLOR=âRedâ]Styke worms[/COLOR]

2mcgksi.png765Ã550
[/CENTER][/QUOTE]

Download Client - http://www.2shared.com/file/yUvFLz6y/RuneLive_Client.html
Download Cache: UppIT - Free File Sharing - RuneLive_Cache.rar - place the cache in ur c:/ drive.

we maxed 552 players, and over 2.6k of donations a month

P.S I also will report flame, I know it#s bad but atlest it got players unlike some other serverâs that are done much better then this,I also do not expect many people to download it, but have fun guys, Cache is coming maybe in an hour after my dinner. LEAVE A COMMENT OR I REMOVE

some extra info for people who donât read :L

Ok for windows 7 / 64 bit:

@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server EXIT

change the exit to pause it should now look like

@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

windows vista/xp/32 bit:

@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files (X86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server EXIT

change the exit to pause it should now look like

@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause

now to fix client go to the client.java

search for

[runelivepk656.no-ip.org

change to:

127.0.0.1

now search for:

			socketStream = new RSSocket(this, openSocket(5555));

change to:

			socketStream = new RSSocket(this, openSocket(43594));

save, compile, to use the auto restart

use the sar.bat, if you windows 7 user / 64 bit no need to change

if your a windows xp/vista use:

@echo off title Kandarin Server 2010 "C:\Program Files\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server EXIT

::Copyright Â© MMVIII all rights reserved 2008 @echo off title Server Automated Restarter :start set time=[COLOR="#ff0000"]18000[/COLOR] this is seconds so this is 3 hours, each hour is 6,000 seconds. start run.bat :loop cls IF %time% GTR 0 ( set /a time=%time% - 1 set /a min=%time%/60 echo Next Restart In %time% Seconds. echo %time% Seconds is %min% Minutes. ping 127.0.0.1 -n 2 > NUL goto loop ) taskkill /f /im java.exe cls goto start ::Made By RSC/Logical

how to compile in client (windows 7/ 64bit)
in 2. compile 21 change:

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

to

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_[COLOR="#ff0000"]YOUR JDK VERSION HERE[/COLOR]\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

in 2. compile 21 change:

@echo off
Title Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_[COLOR="#ff0000"]YOUR JDK VERSION[/COLOR]\bin\javac.exe" *.java
pause[/CODE]

windows 7/ 64bit:
change:
[CODE]@echo off
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javac" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java
pause
EXIT[/CODE]

to:
[CODE]@echo off
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_[COLOR="#ff0000"]YOUR JDK VERSION[/COLOR]\bin\javac" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java
pause

Windows vista/XP/32 bit
change:

[QUOTE]@echo off
âC:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\javacâ -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event*.java src\server\model\items*.java src\server\model\minigames*.java src\server\model\npcs*.java src\server\model\objects*.java src\server\model\players*.java src\server\model\players\skills*.java src\server\model\players\packets*.java src\server\model\shops*.java src\server\net*.java src\server\task*.java src\server\util*.java src\server\world*.java src\server\util\log*.java src\server*.java src\server\world\map*.java
pause
EXIT[/QUOTE]

item.source: RsuneLive - Everything you've always wanted! -Now Hiring-
